Name: 告死天使的审判-Death Angel Trial
About the game: ★ game introduce ★ [/] Warm tips: the game has violence, murder, abuse and other disharmonious elements, as well as a very explicit description of network violence. Players who are not comfortable with this should consider it or play with others. Otherwise, the author is not responsible for the consequences. This is a game about online violence, all of which are based on the personal experience of the producer and shared with netizens. As far as possible to reduce the reality of one after another bloody cruel phenomenon. The game chooses the third person perspective to tell the events the protagonist sees and experiences, and the materials are all adapted from the real events. Hope to create an immersive effect for players. The cruelest violence may be around us, but we choose to chew the blade and swallow it, and turn a blind eye. Words can also kill people. Language also has temperature. There is a place in the world where you can hurt or even kill your compatriots without paying any price—— This place is called the human world（Internet world）. Today's victims may only be a little-known person, and the next It could be you. ------------------------------------------------- ★ game elements ★ 〇More than 100 stories CG 〇Game maps are all self-made materials of developers 〇A long story with more than 200000 words 〇The depressing atmosphere set off with the story 〇Background music enough to make people cried 〇Unique role dubbing, it is strongly recommended to wear earphones when playing ------------------------------------------------- ★ operation method ★ [/] Keyboard direction key movement Z key / enter key / space bar are survey items The X / ESC key opens the menu and rewinds it Use the item actively. Please open the menu where you need to use the item. Abolish the original archive mechanism, crystal ball is the current archive point ------------------------------------------------- ★ follow us ★ [/] Official QQ group: 124925250 Finally, thank you for your visit!
